statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_investments ORDER BY investment_date DESC, investment_return ASC
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, investment_amount FROM cryptocurrency_investments WHERE investment_amount > 1000
SELECT investment_id, cryptocurrency_name, investment_date FROM cryptocurrency_investments WHERE investment_profit > 0 ORDER BY investment_profit DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_investments WHERE cryptocurrency_name LIKE 'Bitcoin%'
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount + investment_return AS total_investment FROM cryptocurrency_investments
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_investments WHERE investment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY investment_profit DESC, investment_date ASC
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, investment_amount FROM cryptocurrency_investments WHERE investment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT investment_id, investment_return FROM cryptocurrency_investments WHERE investment_profit < 0.00
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_investments WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, SUM(investment_profit) AS total_profit FROM cryptocurrency_investments GROUP BY cryptocurrency_name ORDER BY total_profit DESC
SELECT * FROM investments;
SELECT investment_id, cryptocurrency_name, purchase_price FROM investments;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, purchase_date, quantity FROM investments;
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT investment_id, cryptocurrency_name, purchase_price FROM investments WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE purchase_price > 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, quantity, purchase_price FROM investments WHERE quantity > 10 AND selling_price > purchase_price;
SELECT investment_id, cryptocurrency_name, purchase_date FROM investments WHERE purchase_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT profits.profit_id, investments.investment_id, profit_amount FROM profits JOIN investments ON profits.investment_id = investments.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE cryptocurrency_name LIKE '%Bitcoin%' ORDER BY purchase_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT investor_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment_amount FROM investments GROUP BY investor_id;
SELECT profit_date, SUM(profit_amount) AS total_profit FROM profits GROUP BY profit_date HAVING total_profit > 10000;
SELECT investment_amount, transaction_type FROM investments JOIN transactions ON investments.id = transactions.investment_id;
SELECT profit_amount, transaction_type FROM profits JOIN transactions ON profits.investment_id = transactions.investment_id ORDER BY profit_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000
SELECT investor_id, COUNT(id) FROM investments GROUP BY investor_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 2
SELECT SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investments FROM investments
SELECT investment_amount, investment_currency FROM investments WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(profit_amount), MAX(profit_amount) FROM profits
SELECT * FROM Investment;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM Investment WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, cryptocurrency_price FROM Cryptocurrency ORDER BY cryptocurrency_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT investment_name, profit_amount FROM Investment INNER JOIN Profitability ON Investment.investment_id = Profitability.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM Investment WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investment_id, investment_name, investment_amount FROM Investment WHERE investment_amount > 1000 AND investment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY investment_date ASC;

SELECT investment_name, SUM(profit_amount) AS total_profit FROM Investment INNER JOIN Profitability ON Investment.investment_id = Profitability.investment_id GROUP BY investment_name ORDER BY total_profit DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, market_cap, cryptocurrency_price FROM Cryptocurrency WHERE market_cap > 1000000000 AND cryptocurrency_price > 1000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC, cryptocurrency_price ASC;

SELECT Investment.investment_name, Cryptocurrency.cryptocurrency_name, Transaction.transaction_type, Transaction.transaction_amount FROM Investment INNER JOIN Transaction ON Investment.investment_id = Transaction.investment_id INNER JOIN Cryptocurrency ON Transaction.cryptocurrency_id = Cryptocurrency.cryptocurrency_id WHERE Transaction.transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Transaction.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments;
SELECT investment_id, investment_date, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, cryptocurrency_symbol FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY cryptocurrency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' AND transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT investment_id, SUM(profit_amount) AS total_profit FROM profits GROUP BY investment_id HAVING SUM(profit_amount) > 1000 ORDER BY total_profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY investment_date DESC, investment_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 500 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;

SELECT cryptocurrencies.cryptocurrency_name, investments.investment_amount FROM cryptocurrencies JOIN investments ON cryptocurrencies.cryptocurrency_id = investments.cryptocurrency_id WHERE investments.investment_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY investments.investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy' AND transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT reports.total_profit, profits.profit_amount FROM reports JOIN profits ON reports.profit_id = profits.profit_id WHERE reports.total_profit > 5000 ORDER BY profits.profit_amount DESC, reports.total_profit ASC;
